level.heading: CANCELLATION OF A SHELTERED MARKET SOLICITATION (ยง 30-2007)

level.text: If the contracting officer cancels a sheltered market solicitation for any reason, the contracting officer shall provide a copy of the determination to the Executive Director and the Board.
If the service or supply is still required after the contracting officer cancels a sheltered market solicitation, the contracting officer may resolicit the requirement in the open market.
